subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gary Boren, an investment banker who is the N.B.A.’s lone free throw coach, has helped the Dallas Mavericks finish first in free throw shooting in four out of his six seasons with the team.
snippet: Gary Boren, an investment banker who is the N.B.A.’s lone free throw coach, has helped the Dallas Mavericks finish first in free throw shooting in four out of his six seasons with the team.
